about.title: About me
about.primary: Hello! I'm currently building APIs in the financial industry.
about.secondary: In my free time, you can find me camping, at a coffee shop, at a beach, or shopping yard sales.

projects.title: This personal website
projects.description: This is a website I deployed from a React template shared by a creative developer, who is linked at bottom. I deployed it to AWS S3 as a static website served by a Cloudfront distribution configured to use an SSL/TLS certificate.

contact.title: Contact
contact.description: This is where you can describe about your contact. The more you describe about your contact, the more chances you have!
